mapper.insert: insert into tiktok_creator_data (user_id, account_id, `date`, `rank`, display_id, income_current, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{displayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeCurrent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tiktok_creator_data set account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `rank` = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, display_id = #{displayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, income_current = #{incomeCurrent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, account_id, `date`, `rank`, display_id, income_current, create_time, update_time from tiktok_creator_data where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select user_id, account_id, `date`, `rank`, display_id, income_current, create_time, update_time from tiktok_creator_data
